screen: Action: ExtensionState Synopsis: Check Extension Status Privilege: call,reporting,all Description: Report the extension state for given extension. If the extension has a hint, will use devicestate to check the status of the device connected to the extension. Variables: (Names marked with * are required) *Exten: Extension to check state on *Context: Context for extension ActionId: Optional ID for this transaction Will return an "Extension Status" message. The response will include the hint for the extension and the status.
